title: Queue health comes to patch notes

replies.body: Just give us Normal Draft. Or replace Blind Pick with Normal Draft. Looking at how popular it is in NA, I personally think that Riot is insane for deciding to ditch it completely.
I do miss Draft pick. Was pretty sad when it was removed from OCE.
YES RIOT PLEASE EVERYONE IS SICK OF BLIND PICK
Normal draft would be my most played queue

but i like blind pick 
alot
I wish i could be matched with people that have good attitudes rather than their rankings. Also maybe be nice if there were more ways to help new players get into the game.

AUTOFILL IS THE BANE OF SOLO QUEUE EXISTANCE. Seriously though, it just happens way too often and is ruining more games than it should. Pls reconsider leaving it as a constant feature, because so far it has been the case for 80% of my games
pls consider getting better at the game (i dont think autofill is contributing to you having a 35% win rate on 2 of your most played champs) :)
Well... I feel like this comment was about as damaging as a fed Teemo
teemos are great
#Triggered
your be the uhhhhhhhhhhhhh bad
Tripple triggered

It goes far beyond just enjoying the game. If you want to have a queue called "Ranked" and expect it to be in the slightest bit competitive, you have to let us be exclusively 1 role, if that's what we choose. No other game has ever required you to be familiar and competent in multiple roles. Wouldn't it be stupid if an mmo forced you to have a leveled character from each class and be proficient with them, just incase the game decided you were going to play a role you didn't sign up for? Wouldn't that be retarded?

If you dare turn flex into a 5 man only queue. 

I have not spent preseasons climbing up this mess of a queue to be told it's just 5 mans.
if u guys put supp as primary its fine! i have never auto filled, always got my primary choice and never had a queue longer than 5 min lol.

Am I the only person in existence to not only have better queue times since dynamic/flex but also never have been autofilled?
Let me rephrase that.
I've always got my primary or secondary selection, be it mid, top, or adc.

i feel like you should be rewarded for having to have a game remade, like, the team that remade didnt lose anything, but you lost time, an entire game, that could have easily put you in promos or whatever else, you should earn at least some lp for that, jsut likeany other team game, the winner gets some points for winning, regardless of how they won.
i think thats a stupid idea and im sure everyone else does too. probably why it hasnt been implemented
I rarely log in on the LoL website but I had to tell you to stop being an asshole to people for their opinion. Seriously, no wonder you're a careless phantom that has no friends. Get {{summoner:14}}
I mean, I find it annoying to have to queue up, finally get in a game and have it suddenly remade, so I see his point. However it, if ever implicated, would definately need to be altered.
I'd be happy for even 1 lp as compensation
Your attitude might come off as a little careless, Phantom

I believe I speak for 90% of people that get autofilled by saying, "I WOULD HAPPILY WAIT FOR 15 MINUTES TO GET THE POSITION THAT I ACTUALLY QUEUED FOR! AS OPPOSED TO A 3 MIN QUE TO PLAY A LANE THAT I DO NOT ENJOY" 

I care about the quality of my games not the quantity. As a mid laner I feel I might actually get mid more often if I put it as second preference. I don't understand why you care about keeping queue times low because I end up playing a 30 minute game as support/adc when I could wait for HOWEVER LONG IT TAKES TO GET THE LANE THAT I WANT TO PLAY FOR 30 MINUTES!

I think people underestimate how long they would be waiting.

simple example splitting people up by desired role:
23% mid
23% Jg
23% Top
23% adc
8% Support
The key here is that people wanting to play support are about 1/3 of the number wanting to play other roles.

now this means all the support players will be in a game, and a corresponding amount of people from other roles will be in game too, so 8% of the player base for each role.

that leaves 23-8 = 15%x4 = 60% of people waiting at any given time, or put another way, 15/23 ~= 2/3 of the time you will be waiting for a game rather than playing it, if your not supporting.

now this is a dynamic problem, people who say screw waiting for an hour and a half for a game (which is what it would be) will take one for the team, and go support. but when they go back to their role, they will just have to wait as long as the next guy.

prsonally I think implementing some kind of token system might work a bit better. play support and get 3 priority tokens so you can jump to the front of the queue for the next 3 games not as support. people who refuse support might be waiting for ages, but they can do that if they want.

Except the other lanes kinda look like this:
30% top
30% mid
25% Jg
20% adc
5% support
that makes no sense, it adds to 110% you crazy xD

It does too, whoops, thanks for the pick-up

so fixed would be 

top: 25%
jg: 20%
mid: 35%
adc: 15%
supp: 5%
Riot is basically encouraging everyone to have versatility and cooperation. Learn 2 or 3 supports champs and you're pretty much good to go.
High five bro. Same here. Also ignore that asshole who commented on your post. He showed up at mine as well{{summoner:3}}
i believe you're wrong and your suggestion is garbage

How about you guys bring back 3v3 ranked. For myself and I am sure alot of others would prefer to have 3v3 ranked rather than Flex.
I dont like playing normal 3v3 as I think it is a waste of time if you arent gaining anything from it, yet if you had ranked 3v3 and let us try and test queue times then go from there.
Flex has been a failure with your Matchmaking, Why not keep ranked simple... 5v5 Teams, Solo, Duo and 3v3 ranked please!

[We started testing 3v3 Ranked Flex yesterday](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/5ruA0Wov-scheduled-changes-to-ranked-queues-in-oce). It has replaced Thursday TT Normals and runs from 3Pm to 1AM. Be sure to give it a shot next week.

Hey Gehirn, I just find it very annoying that you guys spend sooo much time trying out new game modes and queues yet neglect 3v3 ranked. When I was on the NA servers before OCE was available in Season 3 I playing nothing but 3v3 ranked. When we swapping to OCE for ping, I was extremely disappointed that 3s wasnt even an option. I think before you guys look at stupid flex queues, look at 3v3 ranked for like a week or two flat like solo/duo and test the queue times. You might be surprised, but I am sure the backlash about how poorly the flex queue matchmaking is I would say the worst queue released. Challengers playing against Silvers/Bronze is terrible experience for lower ranked guys.
Clearly you don't understand anything. 5v5 is always going to be vastly superior to 3v3. The truth is, it's going to have less players than flex. If you want to play it that bad just transfer to NA.

OCE doesn't currently have the population to support all the wacky and wonderful game modes riot doesn't dedicate time to balancing. It isn't that there isn't enough people to run games on 3v3, its that those people playing 3v3 wont be playing 5v5 and that will affect the queue times elsewhere.

When I queue up for a lane I should expect to be able to get the lane that I queued for.

I think search options should be available for people. The people who want to get into games quickly will be able to do so as the algorithm for matching their games will be more lenient and allow more filling.

But for people who want to play a single lane and that's it, they should have that option too.

I'll give an example.

Suppose you're a top lane main and you've invested hours upon hours of practicing the different top lane matchups, you learn which champions counter which, which champions you're good at and what's strong, how to manage your minions, approximate jungle gank times, optimal trades, optimal builds, optimal runes and optimal masteries. 

You pick top because it's what you're good at, you can carry harder and be more of an asset to your team if you're in that position.

Imagine you get filled to jungle, you won't be as good in the role, you're not currently well practiced in the role, you're unsure if the champions that you've previously played in the jungle are still good, you're unsure of what jungle items are good anymore, you're unsure of the clear paths anymore, you're not well practiced in the matchups, your runes are likely to be sub-optimal, your masteries are also likely to be sub-optimal. 

You're not as much of an asset to your team, you're more likely to let them down, you're more likely to throw, you're more likely to dodge, you're more likely not going to have a good experience as well.

I would prefer to wait in queue for 20 mins and have the role that I queued for and that I know I can perform in it.

i was wondering if riot could have a lever that a person could switch for auto fill. for instance if i wanted one of my two roles 100% and am willing to wait longer for a game i could put the lever so that i can but have the same for people who who want a game faster.
This seems like a good idea. Have it as a setting to toggle autofilling

Or just let you select as many roles as you want, from 1-5 with the autofill button that you can click mid-queue if you are tired of waiting. If you want to play mid you should be able to, that was the whole point of implementing the queue xD

Is not very different than selection "Fill" as a second role, isn't it? Except that you want to still have 2 roles AND the fill option.

In that case I think I prefer the @Lilja comment about selecting the 5 roles in a Higher to Lower priority

I cant help but notice that most people complaining about autofill are saying that is screws their fun, don't get me wrong, its cancer, but what if you get ADC from autofill and not know the role, I am a mid/top main, and I got adc. I told my team and no one wanted to help, which is fine. Anyway what I'm saying is, it has a more negative reaction to the team then someones own gameplay. In a team based MOBA such as this, the ADC is the most important role. and the fact that I don't know it at all basically ruined my teams chance at a win, not that I didn't try though.

I hate draft pick and my reason for this is because you sit in a Que for X amount off time... then you spend ages picking who to play then at the last 5 seconds someone dodges and you just wasted 10-15 minutes of time... And I don't want riot to punish those who dodge tbh because half the time I dodge because someone instant locks or they say they are gonna feed or something so I get the hell outta there and jump on old school runescape or something for 5 minutes... If blind pick is removed I'm going to dodge so many games at the last second and troll and say im feeding post lobby screen in an attempt to get others to dodge for a good 2 weeks straight...

So why can't we just queue for a specific role. like the ranked version. queue for top / mid / jg / adc / sup / fill. but instead of having bans and draft pick for counter picking. just have normal pick. would save so much trolling from people pissy they " didn't get their lane". 

the system you guys designed for signing up for a game with a specific role in mind (and a backup role) is a really elegant way to make sure people get to play the role they want. and means less time wasted with trolls in game. But for some unknown reason riot decided that non-ranked play didn't deserve/need/warrant that system.
remove flex and add normal draft lmao
Flexi Queue should allow you to play with 2 tiers higher/ lower. It sucks not being able to rank with your mates.
